response:
"datenprivatsphäre: warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere daten sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "data privacy: why are there still companies that collect and sell our data? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post is written in german, adhering to the style of twitter. it addresses the issue of data privacy and questions why companies continue to collect and sell personal information despite the importance of protecting individuals' privacy. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
